DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the efficacy and safety of light-emitting diode(LED) light therapy on Chinese patients with Depressive Episodes of Bipolar Disorder and to gather prime research data and application parameters of LED light source which is not currently available in China.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study of Light Therapy on Depressive Episodes of Bipolar Disorder
